DataSource.Query: SELECT finance.transaction_master.book, CASE WHEN COALESCE(sales.customer_receipts.check_number, '') = '' THEN 'Cash' ELSE 'Check' END AS type, finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id AS tran_id, finance.transaction_master.value_date, finance.transaction_master.book_date, sales.customer_receipts.customer_id, inventory.get_customer_name_by_customer_id(sales.customer_receipts.customer_id) AS customer_name, CASE WHEN COALESCE(sales.customer_receipts.check_number, '') = '' THEN (tender - change) ELSE check_amount END AS amount, finance.transaction_master.reference_number, finance.transaction_master.statement_reference FROM sales.customer_receipts INNER JOIN finance.transaction_master ON finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id = sales.customer_receipts.transaction_master_id WHERE finance.transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND finance.transaction_master.value_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date AND finance.transaction_master.office_id = @OfficeId;
